```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
# Data input
table <- read.table("allsamples_adiv_gamma.tsv",
                    header=TRUE,
                    sep="\t",
                    row.names = 1)

# P-value groups
p_value <- list(c("NW", "O"), 
                    c("NW", "OMS"),
                    c("O", "OMS"))

# Colors
colors <- c("blue",
            "orange",
            "red")

theme_set(theme_bw())

# Boxplot Observed
boxplot_observed <- ggplot(table,
                           aes(x = group,
                               y = observed_otus)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(color = group)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = group),
             size = 1,
             shape = 21,
             position = position_jitterdodge()) +
  labs(x="", 
       y="Observed crAssphage") +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  scale_color_manual(values = colors) +
  stat_compare_means(comparisons = p_value,
    method = "wilcox.test",
    size = 2)

ggsave("boxplot_gamma_observed_comp.svg")
  print(boxplot_observed)
dev.off()
```
